content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.F_SSTLoadChild') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.F_SSTLoadChild
GO

IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.T_SSTLoadChild') )

GO
